about_page_paragraph_one: Maestro of AI Art & Models, teaching Innovation and Inspiration!
about_page_paragraph_two: An expert developer in C++, Java, JS and Python for the last 26 years.
about_page_paragraph_three: Designed and developed a full commercial AI-Model that analyzes endless parallel time-lines data in 2016 from scratch.
about_page_paragraph_four: AI-Arts & Digital creator for the last few years. Realistic style blended with artistic mind.
about_page_paragraph_five: Certified Kong-Fu master and former Circus-Man.

faq_a1: AI art is the fusion of the Gen-AI technology with creativity, producing unique artworks and mix of art styles that grabs your eyes.
faq_a2: Hagay Onn's art pushes boundaries, offering a glimpse into the future of artistry. With combinations going from portraits and people to magical and impossible worlds, that only he can see.
faq_a3: Absolutely! Dive deep into the world of AI art with engaging discussions and demos. From the basics, up to professional AI tools usage and Tips.
faq_q4: Can I request custom art pieces?
faq_a4: Yes, Hagay offers personalized AI Art creations tailored to your preferences.
faq_a5: Stay tuned to Hagay's social media for updates on upcoming lectures and events. Or contact and order your own lecture! Currently Available: AI-Basics starter-kit, AI Visual Magic, or the AI-chatting like a Pro lecture.
